descriptions:
**Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box: A Unique and Functional Outdoor Addition**

Are you looking for a unique way to attract squirrels to your backyard? Look no further than our Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made from high-quality cedar wood, this charming nesting box is designed to provide a cozy home for these beloved creatures.

**Features and Benefits**

* **Burned Image of a Squirrel**: The outside of the box features a beautiful, hand-painted image of a squirrel by artist Drew Senesac.
* **Removable Roof**: For easy cleaning and maintenance, the roof can be removed with two screws and washers provided.
* **Mounting Hardware Included**: Two pre-drilled holes and two screws allow for secure mounting to any outdoor surface.
* **Large Squirrel Opening**: The 3.5-inch diameter opening provides ample space for squirrels to enter and exit comfortably.
* **Cedar Wood Construction**: Durable and weather-resistant, the cedar wood construction ensures a long-lasting and attractive addition to your backyard.

**Dimensions**

* Outside Dimensions: 12 x 11 x 10 inches
* Inside Dimensions: 5.75 x 9 inches
* Squirrel Opening Diameter: 3.5 inches

**Why Choose Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box?**

* Attracts squirrels and provides a safe haven for them to nest and raise their young.
* Durable and weather-resistant construction ensures longevity and low maintenance.
* Unique burned image of a squirrel adds an artistic touch to your backyard.
* Removable roof and mounting hardware make cleaning and installation easy.

**Order Now and Create a Squirrel-Friendly Oasis in Your Backyard!**

Don't miss out on this opportunity to attract squirrels and add a unique touch to your outdoor space. Order our Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and enjoy the joy of watching these adorable creatures thrive in their new home!

**Introducing the Ultimate Squirrel Haven: Our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box**

Are you a nature lover looking for a unique way to attract squirrels to your backyard? Look no further! Our handcrafted cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box is specifically designed to provide a cozy and safe habitat for these adorable creatures.

**Features That Set Us Apart**

* **Beautiful Burned Image**: A stunning image of a squirrel, artistically burned onto the wall by renowned artist Drew Senesac
* **Removable Roof**: Easily clean and maintain your squirrel house with our removable roof feature
* **Cedar Wood Construction**: Our sturdy cedar wood construction ensures durability and resistance to rot and insect damage
* **Glued and Nailed**: Double-secured for added stability and protection against the elements
* **Squirrel-Friendly Design**: A spacious interior with a 3.5-inch squirrel opening, perfect for our furry friends

**Mounting Made Easy**

* **Pre-Drilled Holes**: Two convenient holes for easy mounting on your desired surface
* **Two Screws and Washers Included**: All the hardware you need to secure your squirrel house in place

**Dimensions**

* **Outside**: 12 x 11 x 10 inches (30.5 cm x 28 cm x 25.4 cm)
* **Inside**: 5.75 x 9 inches (14.6 cm x 22.9 cm)

**Create a Squirrel Paradise in Your Own Backyard**

Don't miss out on the opportunity to attract these delightful creatures to your yard. Order our cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box today and provide a safe haven for them to thrive!

**Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box: A Cozy Abode for Your Furry Friends**

Are you looking for a unique and functional way to attract squirrels to your backyard? Look no further than our Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made from durable cedar wood, this charming abode is designed to provide a safe and comfortable home for these delightful creatures.

**Features:**

* **Burned image of squirrel**: A beautiful, hand-painted image of a squirrel adorns the exterior of the house, adding a touch of whimsy and charm.
* **Removable roof**: For easy cleaning and maintenance, the roof can be removed and reattached with the included screws and washers.
* **Cedar wood construction**: Our cedar wood is naturally resistant to rot, decay, and insect damage, ensuring your squirrel house remains sturdy and secure for years to come.
* **Squirrel opening**: A spacious 3.5-inch diameter entrance allows squirrels to easily enter and exit the house.
* **Pre-drilled holes**: Two pre-drilled holes make it easy to mount the house securely to a tree or fence post using the included screws and washers.

**Dimensions:**

* Outside dimensions: 12x11x10 inches (30.5x28x25.4 cm)
* Inside dimensions: 5.75x9 inches (14.6x22.9 cm)

**Why Choose Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box?**

* Attract squirrels to your backyard and enjoy their entertaining antics
* Provide a safe and comfortable home for these amazing creatures
* Easy to clean and maintain with the removable roof feature
* Durable cedar wood construction ensures years of trouble-free use

**Order now and give your squirrel friends a cozy place to call home!**
